general.description:
Uktalm is the second k'rinn colony. A quite verdant planet with all climates and a variety of ecosystems, it has been colonized by the K'Rinns only a few decades after Mar'K'Rinn'Ra.
When the route by KT64 to Planetarist space was discovered, the planet became a port of call for all kinds of merchant companies nd independant, Free Traders, plying the jump route with Nouvelle-Hong-Kong.
general.bar: A diverse bunch of tradesbeings, mostly K'Rinns and Humans
